channel.title: Real Steel on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Real Steel on Game6r

item.title: Game Robots of Living Steel
item.description: Today you will control a robot that is protecting its race from villains somewhere in a parallel universe. His enemies are the same iron monsters, but they just didn’t work out with their minds. Killers do only what the master orders. And this villain wants to destroy the race of the protagonist. The task in the game is to prove that everyone has the right to life.
